subject: Web3
title: MEV: The Invisible Tax
description: A short lesson to help you apply MEV: The Invisible Tax.

hook.text: Every time you trade on Ethereum, bots may be front-running your transaction to profit at your expense.

buildup.text: MEV â€” Maximal Extractable Value â€” is profit validators and bots earn by reordering transactions in a block.

discovery.text: A bot can see your pending trade, buy the token first, let your trade push the price up, then sell for a profit.

twist.text: MEV extraction has earned bots billions of dollars. Regular users pay slightly worse prices and don't realize it.

climax.text: Researchers are building solutions like MEV-protected transactions, but the problem is deeply embedded.

punchline.text: Invisible bots are skimming profit from every Ethereum trade.

quiz.question: What is MEV (Maximal Extractable Value)?
options: Profit from reordering transactions, often at users' expense
